text:
Hi,

We are trying to read a .msg file and extract it contents. We are able to extract the attachments when it is a pdf, zip file. But when the attachment is another .msg file then we face problems. We are not able to extract that. 

1) is that a known issue?
2) is there any suggestions?

-Ven
creator: venkat_id@hotmail.com

text:
Please re-try with a recent svn checkout / nightly of poi, as HSMF has undergone a lot of changes lately.

If the problem still remains, please re-open the bug, and upload a sample file that shows the issue
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
